comments.en:
SpliX is a set of CUPS printer drivers for SPL (Samsung Printer Language) printers. If you have such a printer, you need to download and use SpliX. Moreover you will find documentations about this proprietary language.

Note that only SPL2 printers are currently supported! However we are looking for people who have a SPL printer to implement it as soon as possible.

Not all SPL2 printers are tested with this driver. Please report your experience here.

As the PPD files are contained in the driver package we will not provide PPD files here on linuxprinting.org.
